short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Links with the Ready Made Stores Wordpress plugin, to import and order products from AliExpress

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension for ReadyMadeStores.com wordpress stores and plugin allows direct import of AliExpress products to the user's dropshipping store , and order placing from your store.

This extension lets you:

- Search for products to import 
- Select and import products  , one or up to 60 products at a time from a category or product page
- Select the categories to import products to
- Refresh the categories to import to
- Place orders with a single click from your store
